content.detailedDescription: Since july last year my partner and i have been watching the skys because we saw a triangular ufo with three bright red lights,every time the sky is clear,stars visible we spend time looking in case we see another one.Yesterday and today we saw an object that looked like a star,no flashing lights just moving past until on both occasions it disapeared.Neither of us could say for sure what they were.It got cold so i came in and went upstairs to look out our bed room window,after about half an hour to my amazement i saw what apeared to be a dark shape,no lights on,that would be discribed as boomerang.Not at all like the triangle i had seen before,it passed over like a shadow,quite low,it was larger than anything i have ever seen before,it had small circular shapes underneath all the way along it on either side it all happened so quick ijust watched it glide by.I am not afraid yet i am still exited and shocked all at the same time.Craft silent.
content.summary: Black boomerang no lights on

content.detailedDescription:
In 1992 i was a senior in high school and studying for test on the night the incident happened.
it was about 1:00 in the morning and started to feel a little tired laid down and could not go to sleep. when i got up i heard a low humming noise coming from outside my first impression was 
i left my guitar amp on stand by and forgot about it but that was not the case. when the noise became more drowning i went to my window and opened my shades and i felt this sense of calming
fear,and intrigue all at once. i saw 3 triangle,diamond shaped objects getting larger or getting closer i could not tell but the strange thing i could not see any thing else except the objects and this emence golden light. i wanted to run outside to see what this was or scream for my parents,
i could not do anything. the next thing i knew the alarm clock going off and my mom coming in the room telling me it was time for school. it felt like a half an hour went by not seven hours.
content.summary: I was going to bed one night when i heard low humming noise outside where there was 3 diamond ,triangle shaped objects hovering in the sky it was about 1:00 am and i passed out and woke up at 7:00 am  thinking only a few minutes had passed.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving back to reno from work in spanish springs when i saw ten or so in the sky. they kept moving into different shapes. at first the lights made a square. when they moved into other shapes they made small explosions. i kept thinking i can't believe no one else is seeing this. when i picked up my wife i told her what i saw an pointed to where they were. she saw them too but this time there was only five or six and they were in a line. they were to far away for pictures to show up on my phone.
content.summary: Several balls of light with small explosions

content.detailedDescription: Lo vimos dos personas y tom��� unas fotos, cruzo muy r���pido,(very fast rectangular ufo)
content.summary: Caugth from my swimpool

content.detailedDescription:
On the evening of january 8, 2011, at approximately 8:pm, i witnessed a ufo drop 2 objects from it's underside.

this ufo has been in the east-northeast sky hovering periodically, for months.  sometimes, there are several others.

i had walked out onto my back patio and looked east because i have become accustomed to seeing this ufo there.  it was hovering as usual, at about the height a jetliner would fly, as it usually is.  after a few seconds, it appeared to drop 2 objects separately.  they appeared to be "falling", but were going too slow to be in free fall.  they appeared to have flames or fire coming out of the bottom of them.  i was unable to see if they actually hit the earth because my wall around my backyard is taller than me.

i think there were others in my neighborhood who saw this too.

i was awestruck.  i've never witnessed anything so clearly, so unmistakably.
i want to know what in heaven's name is going on in the desert in arizona.
unfortunately, i do not have photos or video.
content.summary: Ufo drops 2 fireball type objects

content.detailedDescription: I was looking at the moon with my telaskope then there was a star beside it so i tryed to get it on in view im not very good at getting these things at the mo but any way in the skope the star was moving very fast then i looked out of the windo (i was in my bed room at the time ) and it wasint the star that was moving it was still in the same place it was the first time  what i thought was a star was a orb it was very low in the sky the same hight as a chopper it was very clear to see there was no flashing lights on it just a bright ball of light it was moving nw to se then it went in to a cloud  i know what i saw it was to low to be a star and not high to be a plane and there was no sound and no contrals it was a ufo  i was happy to see it and happy that it happend to me i just wish i had my cam  or was able to wprk that dam teleskope to get a better look
content.summary: It was a bright orb

content.detailedDescription: dec.22nd in independence mo. a friend and i had left a local shopping center and turned west on u.S. hwy 24, when my buddy asked me if i knew what the three white lights in the sky were. as i looked up i saw three bright white lights in a triangle formation,looking closer i saw a faint outline of triangular object in the sky. it was almost the same color as the nite sky (almost a matte black in finish). the object was approximately three football fields in width across and between 2 to 3 stories in height all sides were equal in size and slightly rounded. the object after we noticed it was stationary for about a minute and then started to bank left. in the blink of an eye it quickly flattened out and headed west following u.S. 24 hwy at a high rate of speed. i kept driving west and within about 20 to 30 seconds it was no longer in sight. there was no sound to the object what so ever. my friend and i are sill in complete shock and amazement at what we saw. i have been around aircraft since i was a child and keep up with the new aircraft technology. at this time there are no aircraft in the u.S or any other country with these capabilities or of this size.
content.summary: Large stationary upright triangle with 3 white lights

content.detailedDescription: I've never seen a ufo but think i did tonight at about 7:45 pm in the northern sky over vero beach fl.  my husband thought it was fireworks and i didn't want to take the time to look.  he convinced me and at first i thought so too, but the more i looked, the more i realized it wasn't fireworks.  there were about 6 objects in the sky that were streaking downward and a slight bit apart from each other.  they were flashing on and off with a red light and they hovered in place for about 2 or 3 minutes and started moving slightly east and desending a bit, in kind of row.  i called my neighbors and they went outside with binoculars and they saw them too.  my neighbors were convinced they were ufo's, but they only saw 2 or 3 and finally could only see just one, moving south east.  the objects were blinking and my neighbors said the colors were blue and green.  they could see one object far longer than i could, but they were about 3 blocks away from me, and looking from a different direction.  most unusual thing i've ever seen.
content.summary: There were about 6 objects in the sky that were streaking downward and a slight bit apart from each other.

content.detailedDescription: There were two orange lights flying north to south when they went out of sight a very big red light came into view flying behind them when it got out of sight another very big red light did the same thing it looked like it stopped at one point then went out of sight i have lived here for 4 years and i have never seen anything like that
content.summary: Two orange lights right behind each other then two red lights behind them

content.detailedDescription: As we were standing in our front yard we witnessed a bright orangish object that moved high across the sky from east to west.  while the object appeared as if it was almost on fire, there were no visible flames.  there was no noise and it was definitely not an airplane or a flare. the whole event lasted roughly a minute and a half until the object faded out before reaching the horizon.  the movement was constant, with no change in direction.
content.summary: Bright orange/yellow starlike object moving high across the sky

content.detailedDescription: 1814 on 1/8/2011.  i had just pulled into my driveway and glanced towards the southwestern sky, about 200 degrees magnetic.  i saw 5 round objects in the sky flying at a few thousand feet.  they were following eachother and were far too close for aircraft arriving or departing portland jetport.   none had appropriate lighting for an aircraft and all were moving at a high rate of speed due south east towards biddeford/saco.   their direction of travel was not an apparent straight line, but more like left and right.  i lost sight of them when they went behind the clouds.  it was too dark for my cell phone camera to record them
content.summary: 5 objects in the sky

content.detailedDescription:
I let the dogs out, went outside and looked around. it was so low on the horizon over my neighbors two story i couldn't miss it when i looked that direction. i watched it slowly rise, and couldn't believe that this sighting blew away the one i had from phoenix.

i was excited, since this one was really clear at first. the object was shaped with what i can only explain as it looked like a white dove. similiar to various logo's you see of doves. it was glowing extremely brightly, and did not have a pulse factor to indicate it was a 'star' when it finally rised high enough up out of site. 

while rising, the (what i call) white dove would rotate at approx 45 degrees at a time. holding that direction for a shorter duration the faster it rised. as it got to half way to my sighting ability, it started to change shape to look more like a circle. once it started going this shape, the dove would appear less and less.

at one point i ran inside to get my camera, but the battery is dead. i grabbed my cell phone, which having such a low quality/zoom, you can't really make anything out. (3.2 megapixel). i tried running in after snapping a few picturephone photos of it, grabbing my old telescope. the viewfinder was not setup properly, and by the time i got it usable the object was gone.

object was south of my location, which is the northwest side of houston. mapping it, locate beltway 8 and gessner road. from there it would be southernly. 

i was up most of that evening, being that i continued to hear typical local sounds such as traffic, gunshots, kids racing loud cars, but my favorite was waking up and only hearing the sound of a helicopter. that's when i had realized, i've heard a lot of aircraft activity. i don't normally hear anything but the occasional one here and there after sundown. 

they were the larger, slower, cargo style aircraft. c130 maybe? then the helicopters i can't say for sure, but they did not sound like a huey. i heard but couldn't find it a couple times, and the few times it had passed by i found it with a spotlight on. it was moving too high/fast to be a littlebird by local leo, who i don't even think use or have. i thought that it made more sense that they left it on, and were not using it.

i am not sure if this high traffic volume of military aircraft has anything to do with this ufo. i found it important to say that in my opinion, it does not. there have been a few nights here and there where i've seen it before, though, usually they flyout northeast in sometype of formation, and once the main group is gone, it's over. 

only strange human flying object event i had, was that i heard a small plane. there is hooks airport near by for them, but i've never heard them at 4am. 

i was in and outside of the house a lot that night, hearing typical break-in warning sounds, and checking around the area with flashlight for harris county jail's next member. so for a lot of these human craft experience, i was outside and able to get a clear view around for it's location. 

i could not see the small craft, only hear.
content.summary: Short sighting of object that changed shape

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving on a residential street in ne portland headed west. i was driving slowly as the sun had just set and i was unfamiliar with the neighborhood. without looking up - so it was in my line of view- i saw three lights in the sky. they were a bright white/yellowish, round, and evenly spaced. at this point i was so surprised that i almost completed stopped the car and i could not take my eyes off of the lights. i had two thoughts in my head, "i have to take a picture of this" and "it must be a plane". i pulled the car over and stopped. the lights were getting closer but moving slowly and seemed to be too low to the ground. i could see the shape of some kind of craft but it was dark and this was difficult. i believe it was very large. mainly i was trying to determine if it was a standard airplane. although i don't know the exact shape, i know it was not the shape of a commercial airliner.
as the lights became larger and closer they moved from a horizontal position to a vertical position. now, as i am recalling this, the rest is a little fuzzy although everything i have already typed is crystal clear.
it moved over me and i turned my head to look out of the drivers side window. i looked up and saw a red light underneath. now i began rationalizing again that it must be a plane since i have seen a red light on planes. now i heard a noise similar to an engine sound but quieter, like a "whoosh". now it moved faster away from me but still in my field of view. i believe it was gaining elevation now.
now that i think about it, i can not think of why i decided to look away. i believe i looked away while it was still visible to me which is strange because i would have wanted to watch it until it disappeared from view.
like i said before, the end of this experience was a little fuzzy and almost became dreamlike.
i was excited after seeing this and realized i was rationalizing in my head " it must have been a plane getting ready to land", etc. although i really knew it wasn't and i had seen a ufo. i feel a little confused about how calm i remained (although initally shocked) and especially how the end seemed to be unclear to me in what happened.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: three round horizontal lights, evenly spaced on large object moving slowing and low on the horizon. lights and craft inverted to vertical position

content.detailedDescription:
Good day,during the time of the sighting i was living in a high ride apartment building on the 13th floor over looking center city philadelphia. i always kept my telescope in front my window. my guest got a kick out of looking at the different sights on south 13th street. they especially enjoyed looking down to the spectrum stadium on game night. this particular night i was walking pass my window and something in the sky caught my attention. by this time, i had been living in my apartment for 6 years. i had looked at the sky on many, many nights. but there was something different. i looked through my telescope and what i saw, well, i don���t know what i saw. but whatever it was, i felt that i needed to get it on tape. i got my video camera and did just that. at one point i found myself saying out loud, ���if you���re not stars, give me a sign��� just at that moment these lights blinked three times. well, needless to say, this really got my attention. as a matter of fact, it scared me. did this thing hear me? am i losing it? i continued to film and while i was filing the lights started moving. the only way that i can accurately describe this is to say that it looked like a ship that was nose-diving in the ocean. i filmed as long as it was visible. at one point i got up on the ledge of my window (13 floors up) and filmed until the lights disappeared behind the wanamaker building. these lights move from directly in front of me, to the far right i me, and just disappeared. i could not wait until the next night. at 9:22 pm i was right back in the same window, camera ready. nothing. i filmed the same areas, and nothing was there. that monday i went into work and my former boss was a retired army person. i showed him the tape and asked it he knew what this might be. i asked if this could possibility be stars or the constellation orion���s belt? his answer, and i quote ���if this is orion���s belt, he must be bending over���. i don���t know what that is. he suggested that i contact our local new station and speak with the weather person there. i did. he suggested that i contact the weatherman at one of our other local stations. he gave me his number, and i called. after explaining my reasons, i soon realized that i was an unwilling participant in their joke. how i realized this, this weather person tried to give the number of yet another weather person. i just hung up the phone. i can truly understand why people do not come forth in situations like this. look at just how long it has taken me to say anything about this. and i���m still not sure about this. if this turns out to be no more than a constellation of stars, fine. if not, this uncertainty that i am feeling at this moment about submitting this will be well worth it. the tapes, as well as the camera is available for your viewing and inspection.

thank you,

*(wit's name deleted--cms/sg).
content.summary: There were three lights that was in a half moon shape. at one point the lights flashed three times.

content.detailedDescription:
In my yard i heard a plane it sounded large and it was a deeper sound than normal.  i am about 15 miles from charleston air force base, a c-17 and c-41 base.  i am use to hearing them do training lessons and play follow the leader around the area, this was not them. it sounded like a large jet 767 or the like flying low.  when i looked up i saw nothing and tracked the sound to see if it was just fast.... no plane, no nothing, no contrail, not even at high altitude.  it moved from sse to nw and it covered the distance of the open sky faster than any plane i have ever seen, even fighters.  

i am 10 feet above sea level, it was 64 degrees, the sun was out and the sky was 100% clear.  this may be an audible trick but i don't see how.  my sight is 20/20, i am male, 40, good health; mental and physical.  i saw a few other reports of this type on the web.  

i would dismiss this but 2 years ago i heard the same thing in the same general area but on a pier with 360 deg view and no plane, i think this was also a saturday and about the same time.

if you have an answer please let me know what it is thanks.


*(wit's name deleted--cms/sg).
content.summary: Loud deep jet sound blue sky no plane

content.detailedDescription: On the night that hurricane ike made landfall, my mother and i were standing on our porch admiring the clouds from the hurricane due to their magnificent speed and movement in general.  as i turned to look to the south a boomerang shaped craft with white lights lining the bottom literally slid out of the clouds like it was moving sideways, hovered there briefly then slid in what seemed as quicker motion back into the clouds almost as if it had been 'frightened'.   immediately after it disappeared my first thought was "some sort of government craft/airplane" doing scientific study on the hurricane due to the increasing amount of interest in hurricanes since the 2005 catastrophe of katrina.  i remember my adrenaline got pumping, as it does most of the time when i see something even remotely unexplainable, and my mind started racing as to what it actually was and realized the entirety of its movement was so unusual and unlike anything i have seen before that it couldn't possibly be explained by it being 'government craft'... it simply did not operate or move like any sort of human aircraft i have seen and most definitely looked unlike any craft i have ever seen.  my mother also saw it as well and was speechless.  i asked her "do you see that?!?" and she stuttered "yes.. but what is it?"
content.summary: Literally slid out of the clouds of the hurricane and slid back in opposite direction

content.detailedDescription:
not sure if date is accurate but it was late 2006. one evening i stepped outside to smoke a ciggy and look at the stars (it was clear skies)and noticed an odd blinking object located somewhat above the charleston air force base. it was a pure white blink with a 7-10 second single blink pattern. i could not see any physical details as it was too high to see clearly. it was nearly overhead. as i watched it move slowly towards the north i noticed 4 other lights behaving the same way. after a minute or two, they had assembled together into a circle, hovering still and forming a circular pattern. an occasional blue blink would occur from them. as i watched after a few minutes, they began to slowly disperse and vanished upwards (i noticed the flashing becoming dimmer and dimmer and smaller). i'm prior navy so i am familiar with plane lighting, and this had no known aircraft lighting or flight patterns. i heard no noises or felt no environmental phenomena.
 i took no pictures as i did not own a camera at that time. i had always suspected we were not alone in the universe, but i had not seen any in my life until that point. i kept it to myself and eventually forgot about it until recently.
content.summary: 5 high altitude objects

content.detailedDescription:
Whilst walking home from a charity shop where i work, i turned on to my street as usual walked a few yards on to my street and just happened to look up at the night sky, where i saw a star like object moving across the sky, there was no sound and no aircraft running lights i.E red/ blue or red/ green. 
i'm quite open minded about these things so i thought is this an experimental aircraft/ a satellite or a chinese lantern balloon. 
object travelled in a straight line so i could be making something of this that it is not, all i remember thinking was "holy ****", this is when i noticed it was there long enough to get out my smart-phone and try to get it on film(see attached file), sight was lost as it went behind a building.


this could be anything, i just need to know if this is real or something of this planet!
content.summary: Bright object in sky travelling silent at speed

content.detailedDescription:
It was thanksgiving night 2010 and my roommate, myself and my cousin were having a bonfire on our land and suddenly my roommate noticed a large group of objects coming out of the east low and fast. there were between 20-30 circular, ovular and spherical craft flying in "v" pattern formation out of a glowing blue cloud in the eastern sky. he pointed them out and we all quickly rose from our chairs and looked in shock. the tail end of the formation had long lit up streaks of fire trailing from them, making us think at first it was a meteor shower. it was not.

after nearly three minutes they passed very low over our heads to the north west, changing course from west to northwest with complete synchronization and absolutely zero sound whatsoever, and they were flying lower than passenger planes!

once they passed over us we noticed that the craft on the outer left of the "v" formation left formation and flew in a complete 360��� arch up and around the group of other craft, something none of our jets or meteors can do. at this time one thing was certain, these craft wanted to be observed.

suddenly a bright strobing blue, green & red orb appeared out of thin air about one kilometer to the south of the fleet of craft. this craft was at the same altitude as the others yrt much larger. it then proceeded to chase and catch up with others faster than anything we had ever witnessed before. the fleet of craft then proceeded to run from this object. they all dissappeared into the clouds in the distance. the whole incident lasted over four minutes and left the three of us in shock. we believed this to be the alien invasion we had always feared.

on a side not, both my cousin & roommate where hardcore skeptics and debunkers until that night. they now believe fully.
content.shape: Circle,   Disc,   Fireball,   Oval,   Sphere,   Star-like,   Teardrop,   Other,   Unknown
content.summary: Large fleet of 20 - 30 ufos flys out of glowing cloud, overhead at around 3000 ft, close to us then is chased by another craft.

content.detailedDescription:
Last summer while walking my dog, i observed a low flying object passing over tree tops. as i waited for it to clear, not moving my possition, i realized it had disappeared. i figured i was halucinating and said nothing to no one. the same summer of 2010 i also witnessed two jets flying over the skys of middlesex county, nj when one cloaked for about three seconds reappeared, recloaked for about three seconds, reappeared for about three seconds and recloaked. the amazing thing about the event is that the cloaked jet also lost,masked,or cloaked it's contrails. what spurred me to recount this was a mufon show on history where a gentleman out west recounted a simslar experience to your investigators. i had never mentioned this to anyone before now. 
1. in my front yard sky watching
2. jets often fly over leaving chem trails
content.summary: A low flying boject that appeared to cloak or disappear

content.detailedDescription: Observed the object while flying back to texas. we were at about 35000 feet. the object was jet black - opaque. round solid end with wispy "tail" like a feather. observing the clouds below it, while they were moving nw to se, this object was stationary. after about two minutes it rotated 180 degrees in the same spot. it never dispersed like a cloud or wisp of smoke. and it did not have a "smoke trail" from an airplane or fire on ground. plus it was too high for a ground fire. it appeared to be about 5 miles from the plane (north of the plane). it finally started moving north slowly....Never dispersing but maintaining it's shape and consistency/density.
content.summary: Black object with jet black wispy tail

content.detailedDescription:
Driving on rt. 28, heading north, into derry, returning from salem. just after sunset, sky still light.

low flying aircraft caught my eye coming over trees from the northeast, moving about perpendicular (southwest) to my direction of travel. 

i thought at first it was simply a airplane, as it seemed to have running lights as one normally has, albeit flying rather low (i'm not qualified to make an informed estimate of altitude, but it was perhaps roughly 3 or 4 hundred feet) and moved somewhat slowly, more like the speed a helicopter travels when giving tours and whatnot. 

as it flew over and i began to pass under its line of travel, i realized that it had a black silhouette of a perfect equilateral triangle with a light at each corner. it also had white strobes like a normal aircraft. i don't recall whether or not it had any central lights, but i believe that it did not.

i am familiar with military aircraft which are triangular in shape, and i do not believe this was one: it had straight edges on all sides and no discernible detail in form, as well as appearing to be equilateral.

i passed by it as it moved over the trees to my left.

i experienced no strange effects, aside from being a bit surprised of seeing such a strange object, especially since it seemed so overt.
content.summary: Black equilateral triangle

content.detailedDescription: First spotted the lights in the eastern sky, as we drove along hwy 71. it looked as if it was an airplane, as drake field is less than a mile from the event. we watched it as we drove south and got closer. it was not an airplane, because it was not moving, only huvering. it was lite up enough to see it had mass, but it's shape in entirty was not visable in the dark. we slowed as we drew nearer, as did a vehical in front of us. as we past the object it became blocked by trees, so i had my wife turn around and go back, with phone camera at the ready. as we reached the point that we should be seeing it, it was gone. i am a man with a rather scientific mind. this event left me confused, as i can not logically explain what we saw. this is the second object event for us since 2007, and the 4th unexplained light event in the same amount of time.
content.summary: It had 4 lights 2 white on 2 sides, 2 flashing white lights, and 2 colored lights red and green

content.detailedDescription: My roommate and i were having a bonfire on our three acres of land when suddenly we looked up in the sky and saw a long, four sided, cube shaped glowing trail across the sky. my first thought was "this must be some kind of wormhole or energy contrail from some kind of craft." we looked up and noticed that the trail seemed to go on for miles, it was staying completely still and it wasnt dissapating. i believe we witnessed a wormhole event. as we have witnessed ufos before in large clusters over our land and glowing skies after they passed overhead, i believe this event to be related.
content.summary: Large miles long glowing wormhole in night sky

content.detailedDescription:
12/27/10 @ ~ 2am. i go to take out trash. very quiet night. no wind or traffic or planes. nothing. quiet residential street.I go to take out trash.

i turn and start to walk back to the house and i cant miss this thing coming very slowly up the street.

v shaped craft. one light at the apex, 2 on either side, completely silent stops right over my head, maybe 400 feet. i am just amazed to be staring at this thing. only maybe 20 or 30 seconds then faster than you can believe it flies straight off. truly amazing.

my big regret is i had put my cell phone on the charger in the house or i might have got a picture.
content.summary: V shaped craft

content.detailedDescription:
November 8, 2007 i was upstairs in my home, working on my computer. the room i was in has a window that faces east. it also faces the river that sits behind my property. i needed to use the bathroom, so at exactly 2:45 a.M. i got up from my desk and proceeded to walk down stairs. i stopped at the window to look out at the stars (as i always do) and saw nothing, but a clear sky and stars. i continued down the stairs, used the bathroom and within roughly 3 minutes was walking back up the stairs. when i got back to the window, there, sitting on top of the water was an extremely bright light. this light was about 600-700 feet away from my property, but was hoovering just above the water. i've lived here all my life and have never seen anything like this ever. the first thing i did was look up to the sky and to my grandmother said, "nana i am so sorry i didn't believe you". 

with that said, i ran for my camera which had a dead battery. i plugged it in then went outside. it was very cold that night, i ran down to the water and in my backyard stood on top of my firepit to get a better/clearer look. i tried so hard to get my eyes to focus on the source of this extremely bright light, but i could not see anything, the light was to blinding. so bright that it lit up a large area of the river. i watch this object for about 10 minutes outside, then ran back in my house to see if my camera was charged enough to get some video, and it was. i took about 12 minutes of video before the tape ran out. but i watched this light slowly rise upward in a southeast direction. by 7:00 am the object could still been seen, it was the only object left in the sky but now it was so high that it appeared to be nothing more than a star. then it just disappeared. the object on the river made no noise, had no smell. i believe whatever it was could see me just as i could them, but did not in anyway bother me.

although what i am about to say may seem strange to some, but what i saw that night hoovering over the river, was one of the most beautiful things i'd ever seen in my life. for some reason i was not afraid, i was, and still am, amazed at this phenomenon. 

from nov. 8, 2007 until jan. 2008 there were 3 strange objects in the sky. we, my family and i watched them fly in from the northern sky as early as 6:00 p.M, and they would stay until day break. for almost 3 months, night after night two of them would stay high in the sky, looking like stars, while the 3rd ufo would slowly make it's way down towards the water, but never coming as close to the river as it did that night on nov. 8, 2007.  erratic movements, up and down, back and fourth very quickly, was the way these objects moved. being as high as they were at times, if you gave them a quick look one would think they were stars, until they moved, it was only then that you could see they were nothing like anything we have on earth. and, at times they seemed to try and hide within the constellations. 

 it was on or around nov. 19, 2007 9:00 pm while standing on my back steps facing east watching the 3 ufo's, when something big and dark caught my eye flying south, but coming from the north sky. i turned around and as i looked up, i saw a diamond shaped, black object, with 4 white lights, one light at each point of the craft. this object flew over my house and my neighbors houses. i did not get a picture or video of this but i will never forget what it looked liked. nor will i ever forget that bright light on the water. since that night and the nights that followed i have seen more ufo's in my area. i only wish i would have listened to my grandmother who told me about these ufo's visiting our small town over 35 years ago...  there are two photos attched to this story, they were taking from my backyard, with a samsung digital video camera on november 8 2007.
content.summary: Extremely bright light hoovering on/over the water, couldn't see object light was to bright.

content.detailedDescription: In july of 2007, i was with my co worker justin cleaning up the grounds at the mercer island beach club. we were outside and i happened to look towards boeing field in the east. there was a strange light that seemed to be hovering over boeing field. it was a star-like shape. i thought it seemed odd and pointed it out to my friend justin. he agreed with me. then, about 15 minutes later, i saw the light, but it was getting smaller and smaller. about a half hour later, i pointed towards the light, and told justin to come take a look at this. the light, that was once the size of a star, was now extremely small. justin and i watched it until it dimmed out. the light just disappeared from sight. justin and i looked at each other dumbfounded. we were speechless the rest of the night.
content.summary: Strange star-like craft hovering over boeing field in redmond, wa

content.detailedDescription: As we were driving west on thunderbird from 19th ave, something caught my eye in the sky the flight pattern looked as if it was flying east over thunderbird ave. as we got closer i seen a 2nd fireball appear, i rolled down the window and asked my daughter to get a clearer view see if it was a plane. we both say it looked like a fireball she continued to look at the object i proceeded to drive west on thunderbird. turned into my neighborhood looked for an opening in the trees and seen one fireball heading north, i don't know what happened to the other fireball. but the one i followed faded away into the distance. this object was fling closer than the planes. it did not appear to be big maybe the size of a volkswagen in the shape of a fireball. it seemed to be pulsating as well
content.summary: Fireball in the sky glidding over north phoenix

content.detailedDescription: I was coming out of my grandmas after family get togather everyone still inside but me an my brother, i open back door on car to get in, my brother pushed me out of way and jumped in seat ,it was a first kinda thing. thats when i saw it, filled the sky, a got scared an set in the car an shut door, i watched as it flew over me, in some areas i was able to see stars between some parts, if thats what u would call them, i say two attached ships of mayb a mile width or more, and in a docking type of set up, sorry back to event, it went over the top of the car at an angle, i still to this day dont know why i didnt scream, i just started wanting to see more , i turn my head to see it come across other, but didnt ,i asked james did u see it, he said what?  i jumped out to look and it was gone, try to tell parents they just kept talking adult talk, my grandma was the only person that even beleive me,that was the start years ive hunted my whale, no signs pictures nothing, all these disc an triagles, at times i would think dude ur nuts, no one else has seen this ,no one talks about what i saw,but as u hav heard bfor these things wont let u forget, i know that boat as well as my moms own face, it was there, so brings me to u and why now, i found it after all this time, now i can show u the piture an show u whats missing off boat in picture, boat is another name for ship to me sorry, u guys will find ship fantasic. to much time gone by for much else, but if ur like me an love science, all things reveloent, p.S they want me to talk bout what thought it was when first saw, no other words come to mind than wrong,not suppose to b there.Then felt fear but like the kind u dont want to take ur eyes off for many reasons
content.summary: Flew right over the top of me, hugh filled sky. no sound ,life changer, still we cant hold anything that big in sky

content.detailedDescription: In blue bell, pa, at 7:43 pm, i was sitting in the car with my friend outside his house, when we noticed three lights in a triangle in the sky. we watched it, and we knew it wasn't airplane because it was so close to the ground and it was arcing toward the ground, in a parabolic arc, nothing like the path of an airplane. we were shocked when we saw it, too shocked to think about taking a picture until it was too late. it went below the tree line after about 3 seconds and we lost sight of it for good.
content.summary: 3 lights at the corners of a triangle. flying low and arcing toward the ground.
